hero.title: Development Journey
hero.subtitle: Game Development Journey from Enrollment to Present
hero.description: A chronological showcase of each project from vocational school enrollment to the present, including development period, technologies used, and achievements.

items.title: ElementBattle
items.description: My memorable first card game. Developed while learning functions and variables.

items.title: Split
items.description: First team development 2D action game. Experienced full process from planning to debugging.

items.title: UnderOver
items.description: 2D action game developed while learning Unity-specific methods. Culmination of Unity basics.

items.title: Takashi, Betting on Life
items.description: 2D shooting game developed in 3 days during school game jam. Led a team of 5.
items.award: Horikawa Award from Infinite Loop Inc.

items.title: Butterfly Rebellion
items.description: Entry for Sapporo Game Camp 2025. 2D action game developed with a team of 7, all meeting for the first time.
